document.full_text: baidu inc, china's largest search engine, said on thursday it would introduce anti-piracy technology for its document and books product in may, countering criticism that the firm has been lax in dealing with copyright-infringing material.
document.title: baidu to introduce anti-piracy technology for books product
lines_and_colors: baidu inc, china's largest search engine, said on thursday it would introduce anti-piracy technology for its document and books product in may, countering criticism that the firm has been lax in dealing with copyright-infringing material.
